pullrequest.title: Created OperationalSpaceController plugin example that uses DART

content.raw: To elaborate on this, the benefit is that if we make a change to what kind of data we require in `ForwardStep::Output`, then a developer (or user) who has written a Plugin that claims to be suitable for modifying a `ForwardStep::Output` will get a compilation error when they build against the latest version of our library, until they update their class to meet the latest specification.
content.html: To elaborate on this, the benefit is that if we make a change to what kind of data we require in ForwardStep::Output, then a developer (or user) who has written a Plugin that claims to be suitable for modifying a ForwardStep::Output will get a compilation error when they build against the latest version of our library, until they update their class to meet the latest specification.
